name: Obeleric
description: The Obeleric is a Medium aberration with an imposing physical presence, resembling a boulder when motionless, showcasing its chaotic evil nature and tentacled true form.
memorable: The ability to transform into a boulder and use devastating charges makes it a unique threat.
goals: Typically aims to ambush and overpower foes using its versatile attack options.
relations: May be encountered alongside other aberrations in desolate or chaotic environments.
environment: Often found in rocky terrains or areas with loose boulders, hiding until it ambushes prey.
strengths: Strong physical capabilities, multiple attacks per turn, and strategic defensive transformations.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, which limits its cognitive and social abilities.
attacks: Can perform multiple powerful attacks including Boulder Bash, Tentacle Slam, and Spit Acid, dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ricochet Charge allows it to target multiple enemies in a single turn after successfully knocking one prone.
senses: Possesses tremorsense within a range of 30 feet, enabling it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Has an average perception modifier, contributing minimally to its detection abilities.
additional_information: Immune to being petrified or prone.
Can roll into a defensive boulder form for added protection.
Deals additional acid damage on certain attacks.
Can vomit acid in reaction to taking bludgeoning damage.
Uses its False Appearance ability for effective ambush tactics.
test_queries: chaotic aberration that ambushes in rocky terrain
formidable enemy with multiple melee attacks
monster that can blend in as a boulder
